text: NumPy: calculate averages with NaNs removed
How can I calculate matrix mean values along a matrix, but to remove nan values from calculation?

code:
import numpy as np
dat = np.array([[1, 2, 3], [4, 5, np.nan], [np.nan, 6, np.nan], [np.nan, np.nan, np.nan]])
print dat
print dat.mean(1)
